languages.text: "Я даже не ведал о том, что было какое-то оружие! Мне указали на изменников, и я их выследил! Не брал трофеев, не участвовал ни в каких темных интригах! Думаешь, я желал бы, чтобы в руки этого хитрого пронырливого юкко попало нечто поистине могущественное?! Да я ему даже свой топор не доверю!"

"I never even knew there was a weapon! I was told of traitors, and I tracked them down! I claimed no trophies, I had no part in any dark intrigues! You think I would have wished that sneaky, scheming viper to get his hands on something so powerful? I wouldn't even trust him with my axe!"
languages.original_text: "Я даже не ведал о том, что было какое-то оружие! Мне указали на изменников, и я их выследил! Не брал трофеев, не участвовал ни в каких темных интригах! Думаешь, я желал бы, чтобы в руки этого хитрого пронырливого юкко попало нечто поистине могущественное?! Да я ему даже свой топор не доверю!"

traits.locale_text: "I never even knew there was a weapon! I was told of traitors, and I tracked them down! I claimed no trophies, I had no part in any dark intrigues! You think I would have wished that sneaky, scheming jukko to get his hands on something so powerful? I wouldn't even trust him with my axe!"
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

You think I would have wished that sneaky, scheming jukko to get his hands on something so powerful? I wouldn't even trust him with my axe!"

You think I would have wished that sneaky, scheming viper to get his hands on something so powerful? I wouldn't even trust him with my axe!"

traits.locale_text: "I never even knew there was a weapon! I was told of traitors, and I tracked them down! I claimed no trophies, I had no part in any dark intrigues! You think I would have wished that sneaky, scheming viper to get his hands on something so powerful? I wouldn't even trust him with my axe!"
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: “我当时根本不知道什么武器的事情！有人告诉我，说钻出来一群叛徒，于是我找到了他们的下落！我没有拿到任何战利品，也没有参与任何阴谋诡计！你真的以为，我愿意让那只阴险狡诈的毒蛇得到这么强大的武器吗？我甚至连我自己的斧头都不会给他！”
languages.original_text: "I never even knew there was a weapon! I was told of traitors, and I tracked them down! I claimed no trophies, I had no part in any dark intrigues! You think I would have wished that sneaky, scheming viper to get his hands on something so powerful? I wouldn't even trust him with my axe!"

traits.locale_text: “我当时根本不知道什么武器的事情！有人告诉我，说钻出来一群叛徒，于是我找到了他们的下落！我没有拿到任何战利品，也没有参与任何阴谋诡计！你真的以为，我愿意让那只阴险狡诈的臭虫得到这么强大的武器吗？我甚至连我自己的斧头都不会给他！”
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: « Je n'en connaissais même pas l'existence ! On m'a parlé de traîtres et je les ai traqués ! Je n'ai pris aucun trophée, je n'ai participé à aucun complot ! Vous pensez vraiment que je voulais laisser cette vipère mettre la main sur un objet aussi puissant ? Je ne lui confierais même pas ma hache ! »
languages.original_text: "I never even knew there was a weapon! I was told of traitors, and I tracked them down! I claimed no trophies, I had no part in any dark intrigues! You think I would have wished that sneaky, scheming viper to get his hands on something so powerful? I wouldn't even trust him with my axe!"

traits.locale_text: « Je n'en connaissais même pas l'existence ! On m'a parlé de traîtres et je les ai traqués ! Je n'ai pris aucun trophée, je n'ai participé à aucun complot ! Vous pensez vraiment que je voulais laisser ce jukko perfide mettre la main sur un objet aussi puissant ? Je ne lui confierais même pas ma hache ! »
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: 「兵器があることさえ知らなかった！俺は裏切り者の噂を聞きつけて、奴らを追い詰めた！戦利品も手に入れていないし、やましいことに手を染めたわけでもない！あの卑劣で狡猾な毒蛇にそんな強力なものを引き渡すとでも思うか？俺の斧さえ奴に託すことはない！」
languages.original_text: "I never even knew there was a weapon! I was told of traitors, and I tracked them down! I claimed no trophies, I had no part in any dark intrigues! You think I would have wished that sneaky, scheming viper to get his hands on something so powerful? I wouldn't even trust him with my axe!"

traits.locale_text: 「兵器があることさえ知らなかった！俺は裏切り者の噂を聞きつけて、奴らを追い詰めた！戦利品も手に入れていないし、やましいことに手を染めたわけでもない！あの卑劣で狡猾な毒蛇にそんな強力なものを引き渡すとでも思うか？俺の斧さえ奴に託すことはない！」
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: «¡No sabía ni que hubiera un arma! ¡Me dijeron que había traidores y yo les seguí la pista! ¡No me llevé ningún trofeo, ni mucho menos participé en intrigas oscuras! ¿Se piensa que yo querría que esa pérfida víbora se hiciera con algo tan poderoso? ¡No le dejaría ni mi hacha!».
languages.original_text: "I never even knew there was a weapon! I was told of traitors, and I tracked them down! I claimed no trophies, I had no part in any dark intrigues! You think I would have wished that sneaky, scheming viper to get his hands on something so powerful? I wouldn't even trust him with my axe!"

traits.locale_text: «¡No sabía ni que hubiera un arma! ¡Me dijeron que había traidores y yo les seguí la pista! ¡No me llevé ningún trofeo, ni mucho menos participé en intrigas oscuras! ¿Se piensa que yo querría que ese pérfido jukko se hiciera con algo tan poderoso? ¡No le dejaría ni mi hacha!».
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: "Ich wusste nicht, dass es eine Waffe gibt! Mir wurde von Verrätern berichtet, und die habe ich aufgespürt! Ich habe keine Trophäen mitgenommen, ich hatte nichts mit dunklen Intrigen zu tun! Glaubt Ihr, ich hätte gewollt, dass diese hinterlistige, intrigante Viper so etwas Mächtiges in die Finger bekommt? Ich würde ihm nicht einmal meine Axt anvertrauen!"
languages.original_text: "I never even knew there was a weapon! I was told of traitors, and I tracked them down! I claimed no trophies, I had no part in any dark intrigues! You think I would have wished that sneaky, scheming viper to get his hands on something so powerful? I wouldn't even trust him with my axe!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich wusste nicht, dass es eine Waffe gibt! Mir wurde von Verrätern berichtet, und die habe ich aufgespürt! Ich habe keine Trophäen mitgenommen, ich hatte nichts mit dunklen Intrigen zu tun! Glaubt Ihr, ich hätte gewollt, dass dieses hinterlistige, intrigante Ungeziefer so etwas Mächtiges in die Finger bekommt? Ich würde ihm nicht einmal meine Axt anvertrauen!"
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: "Bir silah olduğundan bile haberim yoktu! Bana hainlerden bahsedildi, ben de peşlerine düştüm! Ganimet almadım, karanlık arzulara hizmet etmedim! Sence o sinsi, komplocu yılanın bu denli kudretli bir şeyi ele geçirmesini ister miyim? Ona baltamı dahi emanet etmem ben!"
languages.original_text: "I never even knew there was a weapon! I was told of traitors, and I tracked them down! I claimed no trophies, I had no part in any dark intrigues! You think I would have wished that sneaky, scheming viper to get his hands on something so powerful? I wouldn't even trust him with my axe!"
